```{r setup}
library(glvcausal)
```

# Basic setup
```{r}
seed <- 0
P_star <- 1
Nit <- 10000
burn <- 5000
thin <- 10
```

# Generate toy data
```{r}
data <- generate_toy_data(include_C = FALSE)
```


# Set up prior, initial values, and chain 
```{r}
mh_setup_lst <- set_mh_default()
prior_lst <- set_prior_default(data,1)
init_lst <- set_init_default(seed, P_star, data, prior_lst)
chain_setup_lst <- set_chain(Nit, burn, thin, seed)
```

# Run the algorithm
```{r}
res <- lingcausal(data, mh_setup_lst, init_lst, prior_lst, chain_setup_lst, FALSE)
```

# Result

## B

### Truth
```{r}
round(data$B,2)
```

### MCMC
```{r}
extract_post_mean_all(res, "B")
```
